scenario: XYZ Corp incurred the following expenses: Office Rent: $6,093.61, Personal Lunch: $6,999.10, Bribes: $6,481.49, Office Supplies: $5,932.06.
question: Calculate the total deductible trade or business expenses under I.R.C. § 162.
answer_explanation: Only ordinary and necessary business expenses are deductible. Fines, bribes, and personal expenses are not. Total: $12,025.67.
